attributes.action: Give Scotland A Second Independence Referendum
attributes.additional_details: The political landscape since 2014 has changed drastically, with Scotland being dragged out of the EU against our will. England is a very different country politically to Scotland and should not be considered the same country. Mr Johnson showed his tyranny by denying this previously, not allowing the public to talk for themselves because he "knows best"
attributes.background: Devolve Power to the Scottish Government to hold another independence referendum
